name: ddnsupdater
description: A TypeScript application that automatically updates Cloudflare DNS records with your current public IP address
author: Good Samaritan Software, LLC

scripts.build:exe: yarn build && nexe dist/index.js -t windows-x64-18.0.0 -o ddns-updater.exe
scripts.build:exe:all: yarn build && yarn build:exe:win && yarn build:exe:mac && yarn build:exe:linux
